meanings.definition: In a way that is controlled or determined by a program.
meanings.sent1: The robot moved programmatically according to the instructions.
meanings.sent2: She adjusted the settings programmatically to achieve the desired outcome.
meanings.sent3: The alarm clock went off programmatically, waking him up at the same time every day.
meanings.sent4: The flowers bloomed programmatically, opening their petals in perfect synchronization.
meanings.sent5: The lights dimmed programmatically as the movie started, creating a cinematic atmosphere.

meanings.definition: In a way that involves writing code or instructions for a computer program.
meanings.sent1: He debugged the software programmatically to fix the errors.
meanings.sent2: The programmer coded programmatically to automate the repetitive tasks.
meanings.sent3: The computer screen displayed a message programmatically, surprising the user.
meanings.sent4: The data was processed programmatically, organizing it into meaningful insights.
meanings.sent5: She learned to program programmatically, step by step, mastering each concept.
